TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: A classe representa um servidor de instância de AD LDS.

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > O classe refere-se ao aplicativo de modo ADAM (Active Directory) que foi renomeado para Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: Invoca o KCC (Knowledge Consistency Checker) que verifica a topologia de replicação para esta instância de AD LDS.

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações, consulte o tópico "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" na biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

param.span: Um valor que determina se os recursos gerenciados devem ser liberados.

summary.span: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto e libera, opcionalmente, os recursos gerados.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases managed resources.
